Plot: Owner of a failing club seeks infamous Irish singer Josef Locke in order to bring business and success to his club
Title: Hear My Song
Writer: Peter Chelsom (screenplay), Peter Chelsom (story), Adrian Dunbar
Actors: Brian Flanagan, Constance Cowley, Marie Mullen, Phil Kelly
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 3 nominations.
